name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta until crisp.
Beat eggs and mix with grated parmesan.
Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Grilled chicken pieces in a creamy tomato curry sauce.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste.
Grill chicken until cooked.
Fry onion, add tomatoes and cream.
Add grilled chicken to sauce and simmer.
Serve with rice.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: Mixed vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce.
steps: Chop all vegetables.
Heat sesame oil in a wok.
Add garlic and vegetables, stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook for 2 more minutes.
Serve hot.

Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.
